name: VolleyFall
description:
**THERE IS A BUG WITH GAMEPADS ON THE HTML BUILD. PLEASE CONNECT GAMEPADS BEFORE OPENING THE BROWSER!**

THE HTML BUILD IS A BIT UNSTABLE BUT A REFRESH WILL USUALLY FIX IT! I WILL BE ADDING MACOS AND WINDOWS BUILDS SOON

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

MENU: W AND S FOR CURSOR, ENTER/RETURN TO SELECT

PLAYER 1: WASD MOVEMENT AND 'C' TO JUMP
PLAYER 2: IJKL MOVEMENT AND 'N' TO JUMP

BOTH PLAYERS CAN USE GAMEPAD. LEFT STICK/D-PAD MOVEMENT AND BUTTON 0 (PS4 X, XBOX A) TO JUMP

SINGLE PLAYER NOT READY YET, THIS IS AN UNFINISHED VERSION OF THE GAME :)

CHECK OUT THE PROJECT FILES AND CODE ON MY GITHUB
